sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

const layoutProps = {
  
};
export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"indexcontroller"}}>{`IndexController`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`A `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`IndexController`}</MDXTag>{` tracks the relative positions of an array of items.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="table" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="thead" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="thead">
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Option`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Type`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`DefaultValue`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Description`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tbody" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`items`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`string[] or number[]`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`[]`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`The items to track with this controller.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`loop`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`boolean`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`false`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}><MDXTag name="em" components={components} parentName="td">{`Optional`}</MDXTag>{` - When true, the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`moveForward`}</MDXTag>{` and `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`moveBackward`}</MDXTag>{` methods will move items "forward" from the last position to the first, and "backward" from the first position to the last.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="table" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="thead" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="thead">
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Property`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Type`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Description`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tbody" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`min`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`number`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`The minimum index for any item (always `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`0`}</MDXTag>{`).`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`max`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`number`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`The maximum index for any item.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`order`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`object`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`The order of items.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`items`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`array`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`The items tracked by this controller`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`loop`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`boolean`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Whether the controller is set to loop. When true, the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`moveForward`}</MDXTag>{` and `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`moveBackward`}</MDXTag>{` methods will move items "forward" from the last position to the first, and "backward" from the first position to the last.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="table" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="thead" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="thead">
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Method`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Description`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tbody" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`moveForward(item)`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Moves an item forward in the order.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`moveBackward(item)`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Moves an item backward in the order.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`moveToFront(item)`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Moves an item to the last position in the order.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`moveToBack(item)`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Moves an item to the fiirst position in the order.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`swap(itemA, itemB)`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Swaps the position of any two items.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Example:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-tsx"}}>{`import { Override } from "framer"
import { IndexController } from "framer-controller"

const controller = new IndexController({
    items: ["A", "B", "C", "D"],
})

export const ItemA: Override = () => ({
    style: {
        zIndex: controller.order["A"],
    },
    onClick: () => controller.moveToFront("A"),
})

export const ItemB: Override = () => ({
    style: {
        zIndex: controller.order["B"],
    },
    onClick: () => controller.moveToFront("B"),
})
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
